name: incontrollable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
too strong or violent to be controlled : There is no suggestion that his action resulted from incontrollable impulse. This procedure should be considered only if the blood loss is incontrollable.
More examplesFewer examplesThey display many reckless behaviours, some incontrollable, and so traditional therapies rarely have any effect. You can take a tablet to stop the incontrollable mucus flow.I cannot watch somebody knit without feeling an incontrollable desire to pick up my needles.One would be forgiven for feeling the incontrollable urge to go barefoot on the soft white sand.
